column4: Manikpur - Bashbari Part 2 | Erosion of around 1300 mtr. had occurred w.e..f 17/06/2022 to 30/06/2022.Two (2) Nos of Relief camp opened due to the said erosion (1) Tilpukhuri ME Madrasa ,Male=45 Female=50 Child=30 Pregnant=0 Disability=0Total=125(Latitude-26.39971 Longitude-90.753438) (2)Nabajyoti Club Temp.Shelter, Male=65 Female=70 Child=50 Pregnant=0 Total=185(Latitude-26.426476 Longitude-90.759589) since 17.06.2022 to till date 01.07.2022/Total Inmates-310. Medical Team- 2 Nos. date- 27.08.2022, Total Population-310. erosion continues to Bashbari par 2. on 27.08.2022. Egg-798 nos, Amul Taza-798 pkts, Chira-33.60 kg, Gur-5.60 kg. | 0

Nazira - Amulapatty, ward No. 7, Nazira Revenue Circle | Sloughening and river bank erosion has been observed on 26/08/2022 due to heavy rainfall and seepage from country side to the river side after receding of water level of Dikhow river at Amulapatty, ward No. 7, Nazira from Ch. 5720 m to Ch. 5745 m under Nazira Revenue Circle. | 0
